pr_title: [Bug 1844258]: Job Manager Logging Format Changes for Splunk (ENT-2480)

timeline.bodyText: For the displayed value, we want to use snake case, so "job_key" here is more appropriate.

timeline.bodyText:
MDC_JOB_KEY_KEY
The name sounds a bit silly and redundant, but it is the key for the job key.
